countries.name: China
countries.information: the People's Republic of China (the People's Republic of China), referred to as China, was founded on October 1, 1949

countries.name: America
countries.information: The United States of America ( The United States ) is the capital city of Washington, D.C.

countries.name: Japan
countries.information: Japan (Japan), referred to as Japan, the capital of Tokyo, is an arc of island countries located in the west coast of the Pacific Ocean extending from northeast to southwest

countries.name: Australia
countries.information: The Commonwealth of Australia (The Commonwealth of Australia) is referred to as Australia, the capital city of Canberra

countries.name: France
countries.information: The French Republic (French: La Republique francaise), the capital of Paris, is located in Western Europe

countries.name: Netherlands
countries.information: Kingdom of the Netherlands (Dutch: Koninkrijk der Nederlanden; English: The Kingdom of the Netherlands), short for the Netherlands, the capital of Amsterdam.
